title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 603.2 - Background and intent
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 603.2 - Background and intent

State Regulations
(a) Recent
legislation has determined that the people have the right to know the process
of governmental decisionmaking and to review the records and statistics leading
to those decisions. (b) The purpose
of this Part is to set forth the rules and procedures governing the public's
access to records of OPWDD (see section
603.13
[d]
of this

Part). (c) Nothing in this Part
shall permit disclosure if such disclosure is prohibited under article 6-A of
the Public Officers Law, known as the Personal Privacy Protection Law, or
section
33.13
of
the Mental Hygiene Law. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 14
ยง
603.2

Amended

New

York State Register September 21, 2016/Volume XXXVIII, Issue 38, eff. 9/21/2016

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
